subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Finances
lead_paragraph: Sarah Fisher’s transition to owning her own team has been difficult and costly, and she and her husband have spent at least $100,000 of their own money on the project.
snippet: Sarah Fisher’s transition to owning her own team has been difficult and costly, and she and her husband have spent at least $100,000 of their own money on the project.
